comment.author: 45621760@N00
comment._content: Jag besökte den här kyrkan en gång när jag var liten, och minns fortfarande tydligt hur det doftade där inne. Så otroligt sorgligt att den inte finns kvar.

comment.author: 77936638@N00
comment._content: I'm very sad too read (only now) that this beautiful church was completely destroyed in 2001. At the same time I realise I was lucky enough to see it 'alive' before that dreadful moment.

comment.author: 97449017@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Svenska kyrkor - Swedish Churches, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 97449017@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Sweden before 1945, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
